name: Hercules Gold Run
description:
🎁 Merry Christmas & Happy New Year 2017 🎁

Hercules Run: The Greek Hero legend of hercules is on his journey towards the Adventure for Glory in this endless running game. The Mighty Hercules runs, temple jump, flies, dives through beautiful Spartan ancient and challenging locations in this legendary quest. Keep clear of the hurdles and unexpected obstacles which will surprise you through the way. Unlock and Play other Roman and Greek Heroic characters and help them achieve their objectives. This free 3d game is not just another Spartans or Greek mythology game but a never ending running game filled with fun and exciting elements. Hercules Run is surely going to be your new Hero gameplay addiction!

Hercules Run Game Features:
• 6 Different Spartan War characters with excellent eye catching animation and graphics.
• Challenging tasks to accomplish
• Smooth simulation controls with super addictive gameplay
• Explore different worlds & new mission objectives.
• 100% Free to play.
• Unlock new achievements to challenge your friends on leader board.
• Google Play Optimization: runs perfectly on any Android device.
• Google Play Game Services integrated for leader boards and achievements.
• Share on Facebook and Google Plus.
• Take pictures of your achievements and share then on Facebook and Twitter
• Addicting adventure endless running jungle book game.

How to Play:-
*Tilt your device to steer
( or )
*Swipe up on your screen to jump
*Swipe down on your screen to slide under obstacles
*Swipe left or right to turn. Timing is important!
*Collect as many coins as you can – you’ll need them for power-ups and new characters

This is the best free 3D running game! If you love endless run games then you will love this cool FREE endless running games!
